backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the WoodworkbyTanishas backend, defining data types and CRUD operations for products, customization requests, contact form submissions, user profiles, and analytics, with role-based access control and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two completed features: fixing TypeScript compilation errors in frontend paginated product calls, and correcting authenticated actor construction to properly forward non-anonymous principals to backend endpoints.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON map of frontend source file paths to short summaries describing each component's or page's purpose and recent changes across the React frontend.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens (background, foreground, primary, sidebar, chart colors, etc.).
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the React SPA, mounting the app into a `#root` div and loading the TypeScript entry point `src/main.tsx`.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with all application routes, wraps the app in ThemeProvider, InternetIdentityProvider, and QueryClientProvider, and renders a global Toaster.
frontend/src/components/AdminCategoriesS: Admin UI section for browsing and managing products by wood-type category, with a category grid view, per-category product list, and an add-product dialog using ProductForm.
frontend/src/components/AdminDashboard.t: Renders the admin dashboard overview with analytics stat cards (products, messages, emails, trends) grouped by wood category, using skeleton loaders and a retry button on error.
frontend/src/components/AdminProductsSec: Admin panel section for managing products with paginated listing, add/edit dialogs via ProductForm, and delete confirmation, all backed by direct actor calls.
frontend/src/components/BulkProductImpor: Provides a bulk import UI that fetches pre-configured product images as byte arrays and sequentially adds them to the backend, showing progress and per-item status.
frontend/src/components/CategoryShowcase: Displays a four-category grid (Mango Wood, Acacia Wood, Line Range, Customised Products) with images and links to the filtered collection page.
frontend/src/components/FeaturedProducts: Fetches and renders up to six featured products in a responsive grid with a loading spinner, empty state, and a link to the full collection.
frontend/src/components/FloatingWhatsApp: Fixed floating button that opens a pre-filled WhatsApp chat link, optionally referencing a specific product name.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Full-width hero banner section with a background image, gradient overlay, headline copy, and a call-to-action link to the collection page.
frontend/src/components/ImageGallery.tsx: Image gallery component that converts binary ImageId arrays to object URLs, supports prev/next navigation, and renders clickable thumbnails with a fallback image on error.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Defines the main app layout with a sticky header, responsive navigation (desktop and mobile), authentication-aware login/logout controls, social links, and a floating WhatsApp button.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Renders a clickable product card with an image (converted from binary ImageId), name, description, category badge, and a link to the product detail page.
frontend/src/components/ProductForm.tsx: A form component for creating or editing a product, handling image uploads with compression, field validation, and calling add/update mutations via React Query hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries whenever the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context with login, logout, and identity state management via DFINITY's AuthClient, exposed through a React context and hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks for backend interactions including products, user profiles, customization requests, contact submissions, and analytics.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS styles with a luxury minimalist color palette using CSS custom properties for both light and dark modes, plus a fade-in animation utility.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: Renders the About Us page with a workshop hero image, company story, wood type highlights (Mango, Acacia, Custom), and a commitment section for WoodworkbyTanishas founded in 2021 in Jodhpur.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanel.tsx: Protected admin panel page with a sidebar navigation that renders sections for Dashboard, Products, Categories, Settings, and Bulk Import; redirects unauthenticated users to the login page.
frontend/src/pages/Collection.tsx: Displays a paginated, client-side category-filtered product collection fetched from the backend actor, with load-more functionality and category filter buttons.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Contact page with a form that submits to the backend and opens a pre-filled WhatsApp chat; also displays location, email, and direct WhatsApp contact info.
frontend/src/pages/Customize.tsx: Custom furniture request page with a form collecting customer details and product specifications, saves the request to the backend, then opens a pre-filled WhatsApp message with the order details.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Home page that composes the Hero, CategoryShowcase, and FeaturedProducts components along with an About preview section and a CTA section linking to the Customize page.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Login page that handles Internet Identity authentication, redirects authenticated users with profiles to /admin, and shows a profile setup modal for new users who need to enter their name.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetail.tsx: Product detail page that fetches a product by ID from the URL params and displays its image gallery, description, wood type, finish info, and a WhatsApp inquiry CTA.
frontend/src/utils/imageCompression.ts: Utility that compresses an image file using the Canvas API to a max of 200KB and 1200px dimensions, progressively lowering JPEG quality until the size target is met.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage fallback for cross-navigation persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining a custom design system with oklch-based color tokens, Inter/Playfair Display fonts, custom shadows, accordion animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Project state metadata (version 43) describing the WoodworkbyTanishas furniture site architecture, existing features, known issues (actor-not-available bug when saving products), and authentication details.
